column6: Deep in the Fault, the Imperial Guard uncovers a catastrophic threat to the security of the entire Marvel Cosmos. The question is, can they stop it? Can they survive long enough to get a warning to Gladiator? And is the greatest threat they face actually coming from inside their own ranks? It's more mind-blowing combat sci-fi at its most brutal from the creators that do it best!  Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | letterer:Clayton Cowles | colorist:Nathan Fairbairn | colorist:Brian Haberlin | inker:Kev Walker
